name: Traveler
description:
The Sustainer is dying, the Creator has yet to return.
But the world won't burn again, because you will ascend to the seat of 「God」.

skillTalents.name: Foreign Ironwind
skillTalents.description:
Tấn công thường
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
Trọng Kích
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid Kiếm Đơn strikes.
Nhảy Dậm
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

upgrades.name: Thể Lực Trọng Kích Tiêu Hao
Sát Thương Khi Rơi Từ Độ Cao Thấp/Cao

skillTalents.name: Palm Vortex
skillTalents.description:
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing Anemo DMG 6 times in 1.5 seconds to opponents in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill Thời Gian Kéo Dài ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.
Nhấn Giữ
DMG and AoE will gradually increase.
Elemental Absorption
If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Hỏa/Băng/Lôi elements, it will deal 23% additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
Generate 2 elemental particles when press and 3.5 when hold, if it hit at least 1 target.

skillTalents.name: Gust Surge
skillTalents.description:
Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing Anemo DMG each 0.5 seconds, 9 times.
Elemental Absorption
If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Hỏa/Băng/Lôi elements, it will deal 30.7% additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passiveTalents.name: Slitting Wind
passiveTalents.description: The last hit of a Tấn công thường combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.

passiveTalents.name: Second Wind
passiveTalents.description: Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Raging Vortex
constellations.description: Decreases the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 20%.

constellations.name: Sweeping Gust
constellations.description:
Increases the level of Gust Surge by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Cherishing Breezes
constellations.description: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.

constellations.name: Vortex Stellaris
constellations.description:
Increases the level of Palm Vortex by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Intertwined Winds
constellations.description:
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
